PieceSourceBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of each GameObject from which the user can drag-and-drop additional pieces for their machine. This script should be added to every such GameObject.

piecePrefab.summary: The prefab that this particular piece source instantiates when the user touches it.

mainScriptObject.summary: The GameObject that stores the central data for the running of the program.

camLeftButton.summary: The GameObject that contains a CameraRotateLeftButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the camera-rotate-left button.

camRightButton.summary: The GameObject that contains a CameraRotateRightButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the camera-rotate-right button.

pieceLeftButton.summary: The GameObject that contains a PieceRotateLeftButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the piece-rotate-left button.

pieceRightButton.summary: The GameObject that contains a PieceRotateRightButtonBehaviour and therefore handles the behaviour of the piece-rotate-right button.

OnPointerDown.summary: Called when a user begins to touch the piece source GameObject.
OnPointerDown.param: The data concerning the pointer down event.

PieceTriggerBehaviour.summary: The class that handles the behaviour of each child GameObject, within a machine piece prefab, that contains a collider component. This script should be added to every such GameObject.
